mapper.insert: insert into user_address(user_email, d_key, postcode, road_address, jibun_address, detail_address, lat, lon) values(#{user_email}, #{d_key}, #{postcode}, #{road_address}, #{jibun_address}, #{detail_address}, #{lat}, #{lon})

insert into user_info(user_email, user_password, user_name, user_gender, user_status, user_phone, oauth, role, sms_agree, terms_agree, user_regdate) values(#{user_email}, #{user_password}, #{user_name}, #{user_gender}, #{user_status}, #{user_phone}, #{oauth}, #{role}, #{sms_agree}, #{terms_agree}, sysdate())
mapper.update: update user_info set oauth=naver where user_email = #{user_email}
